Comment: It‚Äôs a shit reason, and also why you can‚Äôt have an educated conversation with them, but they support Trump due to decades of targeted propaganda that taps into deep cultural issues like abortion, immigration, and the decline of traditional industries such as coal and manufacturing. These narratives have been reinforced by conservative media, religious institutions, and political figures who frame complex socioeconomic changes as moral or national threats, creating a sense of victimhood and nostalgia for a simpler, more secure past. In areas where educational resources are limited and civic education is weak, many people rely on their televisions for political understanding, creating an environment where slogans and soundbites shape political loyalty.
